duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide trauma-focused counseling using EMDR and holistic approach.
Maintain a minimum 20-hour caseload, with the option to work on-site or remotely.
Utilize a mindfulness-based, spiritual approach with clients, attending to religious trauma.
Complete billing, notes, and scheduling using provided platforms.
Obtain and maintain credentialing with United Health Care, Health Choice, and BCBS.

education_certification.credential: Licensed as an LPC, LMFT, LADC, LMSW/MSW. EMDR certification highly recommended.
